SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adminstrator
Represents an administrator in the system, inheriting properties from the Staff class.
AdminstratorManager
The AdministratorManager class provides functionality for managing staff and patients, including adding, removing, and retrieving staff based on specific criteria.
AdminstratorView
Represents the administrator's view in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
Appointment
Represents an appointment scheduled between a patient and a doctor.
AppointmentDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) responsible for managing appointment data.
AppointmentManager
The AppointmentManager class provides methods for scheduling, viewing, rescheduling, and canceling appointments, as well as handling appointment requests and recording outcomes.
AppointmentOutcome
Represents the outcome of an appointment, including details such as date, service provided, consultation notes, medication prescribed, and medication status.
AppointmentStatus
Enum representing the status of an appointment.
Availability
Enum representing the availability status.
BloodType
Enum representing the different blood types.
DataBase
Represents a database manager that handles the interaction with various DAO (Data Access Object) components, such as user, medicine, schedule, and appointment data.
Doctor
Represents a doctor with personal and professional details such as schedule, list of patients, and scheduled appointments.
DoctorManager
The DoctorManager class provides methods for managing doctor-related operations, such as viewing and managing availability, medical records, and appointments.
DoctorView
Represents the doctor's view in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
Encryption
Password encoder using XOR and Base64.
FileType
Enum representing different types of files used in the application.
Gender
Enum representing gender options.
Helper
The Helper class provides utility methods for reading user input, parsing CSV-formatted strings, and other helper functions.
HMSApp
Entry point for the Hospital Management System (HMS) application.
HMSAppView
Represents the main view for the Hospital Management System (HMS) application.
InventoryManager
The InventoryManager class provides methods for managing the inventory of medicines, including checking stock levels, dispensing, updating stock, and handling replenishment requests.
MedicalRecord
Represents a medical record for a patient, containing personal details, medical history, and appointments.
MedicalRecordManager
Manages the operations related to medical records, including printing and updating records.
MedicationStatus
Enum representing the status of medication.
Medicine
Represents a medicine with stock management properties such as stock level, low stock threshold, and alerts for low stock.
MedicineDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing medicine data.
Patient
Represents a patient in the medical system, with personal information, contact details, medical records, and a list of appointments.
PatientManager
Manages patient-related operations, including retrieving medical records and updating personal information.
PatientView
Represents the patient view in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
Pharmacist
Represents a pharmacist in the medical system, extending the Staff class with attributes inherited from a staff member.
PharmacistManager
Manages pharmacist-related operations, including viewing inventory, submitting replenishment requests, and updating prescription statuses.
PharmacistView
Represents the pharmacist's view in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
Role
Enum representing different user roles in the application.
Schedule
Represents the weekly schedule for a doctor, containing time slots for each day and their availability status.
ScheduleDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing doctor schedules.
ScheduleManager
Manages scheduling-related operations for doctors, including printing their schedules and personal availability.
Service
Enum representing different types of services offered.
Staff
Represents a staff member, which is a subclass of the User class, with additional attributes such as age.
User
Represents a generic user in the system.
UserDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing user data, including patients and staff.
UserManager
Manages user-related operations such as validating users and resetting passwords.
View
Represents a view in the Hospital Management System (HMS) application.
